title: Pending Claims
subtitle: Your claims are still cooking!
welcome_message: Welcome {username} to the Claim Request System!

modal.approve_title: Are you sure you want to approve this claim?
modal.reject_title: Are you sure you want to reject this claim?
modal.return_title: Are you sure you want to return this claim?
modal.approve_multiple_title: Are you sure you want to approve {count} claim(s)?
modal.reject_multiple_title: Are you sure you want to reject {count} claim(s)?
modal.return_multiple_title: Are you sure you want to return {count} claim(s)?
modal.select_at_least_one_to_approve: Please select at least one claim to approve.
modal.select_at_least_one_to_reject: Please select at least one claim to reject.
modal.select_at_least_one_to_return: Please select at least one claim to return.
